item.title: CVE-2012-2656|2024-08-06T19:42:32.418Z -- www.restlet.org%2F -- restlet
item.description: An XML eXternal Entity (XXE) issue exists in Restlet 1.1.10 in an endpoint using XML transport, which lets a remote attacker obtain sensitive information.
